UD_RandomRestraintManager
Scriptname UD_RandomRestraintManager extends Quest

Contains functionality for getting random devices from Leveled Lists or Form Lists

Abadon Form Lists
UD_AbadonDeviceList_HeavyBondageWeak
Formlist Property UD_AbadonDeviceList_HeavyBondageWeak auto

Form List filled with all weak abadon devices

UD_AbadonDeviceList_HeavyBondage
Formlist Property UD_AbadonDeviceList_HeavyBondage auto

Form List filled with all normal abadon devices

UD_AbadonDeviceList_HeavyBondageHard
Formlist Property UD_AbadonDeviceList_HeavyBondageHard auto

Form List filled with all hard abadon devices

Config
UD_RandomDevice_GlobalFilter
int Property UD_RandomDevice_GlobalFilter = 0xFFFFFFFF auto

Filter used for disabling certain devices from being randomely choosen

IS CHANGED USING MCM. READ ONLY!

BitDetails
0b = zad_DeviousPiercingsVaginal
1b = zad_DeviousPiercingsNipple
2b = zad_DeviousPlugVaginal
3b = zad_DeviousPlugAnal

4b = zad_DeviousHeavyBondage
5b = zad_deviousHarness
6b = zad_DeviousCorset
7b = zad_deviousHood

8b = zad_DeviousCollar
9b=  zad_DeviousGag
10b= zad_DeviousBlindfold
11b= zad_DeviousBoots

12b= zad_DeviousArmCuffs
13b= zad_DeviousLegCuffs
14b= zad_DeviousSuit
15b= zad_DeviousGloves

16b= zad_DeviousBra
17b= zad_DeviousBelt
Example
;Disables hoods and suits from being randomely choosen
UD_RandomDevice_GlobalFilter -> 0xFFFFBFBF
Random Functions
getRandomDeviceByKeyword_LL
Armor Function getRandomDeviceByKeyword_LL(
Actor akActor,
Keyword akKeyword
)
Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to check random on. Device will not be locked on, but this function will return none if actor already have device with akKeyword

akKeyword
Keyword

Keyword which will random device have

Returns

Random device with akKeyword, or none in case of error

getRandomSuitableRestrain
Armor Function getRandomSuitableRestrain(
Actor akActor,
Int aiPrefSwitch = 0xffffffff
)
Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to check random device on

aiPrefSwitch
Int

Filter for setting which devices can be choosen. This value gets ANDed with UD_RandomDevice_GlobalFilter. See UD_RandomDevice_GlobalFilter for more info

Returns

Random device based on aiPrefSwitch

LockAnyRandomRestrain
bool Function LockAnyRandomRestrain(
Actor akActor,
int aiNumber = 1,
bool abForce = false
)

Choose any random suitable device and locks it on actor. Is still affected by UD_RandomDevice_GlobalFilter

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to lock device on

aiNumber
int

Number of random devices to lock on

abForce
bool

If device should be force locked

Returns

True if at least one device was locked on

LockRandomRestrain
Armor Function LockRandomRestrain(
Actor akActor,
Bool abForce = false,
Int aiPrefSwitch = 0xffffffff
)

Locks exactly one random device

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to lock device on

abForce
Bool

If device should be force locked

aiPrefSwitch
Int

Filter to specify which exact devices can be locked on. See UD_RandomDevice_GlobalFilter for more info

Returns

Inventory device of device that is locked on, or none in case of error

See

LockAllSuitableRestrains, LockAnyRandomRestrain

LockAllSuitableRestrains
int Function LockAllSuitableRestrains(
Actor akActor,
Bool abForce = false,
Int aiPrefSwitch = 0xffffffff
)

Locks all suitable random devices.

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to lock devices on

abForce
Bool

If device should be force locked

aiPrefSwitch
Int

Filter to specify which exact devices can be locked on. See UD_RandomDevice_GlobalFilter for more info

Returns

How many devices were locked on

See

LockRandomRestrain, LockAnyRandomRestrain

lockRandomDeviceFromFormList
bool Function lockRandomDeviceFromFormList(
Actor akActor,
Formlist akList,
bool abForce = False
)

Locks random device from passed formlist

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor to lock devices on

akList
Formlist

Form list from which will be device choosen

abForce
bool

If device should be force locked

Returns

True if device was locked on
